bismillah: In the name of Allah, the Most Merciful, the Most Compassionate
homeTitle: Preliminary Structural Safety Assessment Tool for Buildings in Jordan
homeSubtitle: Preliminary assessment only, not a substitute for on-site inspection or official engineering report.
aboutText: This tool is based on ACI 318 and ASCE 7 standards to provide an initial structural safety evaluation. Its purpose is to raise awareness and guide the user to take proper action.
howText: The tool collects data through 30 precise questions, converts answers into points, classifies risk level, and provides clear practical recommendations.
methodText: Questions are based on ACI 318 and ASCE 7, focusing on: structural system, regularity, shear resistance, durability, deterioration, and seismic impact in Jordan.
privacyText: No personal data is collected. All data remains in the browser and is not sent to any server.
disclaimerText: This report is not an official engineering report and does not replace on-site inspection. The tool is for preliminary assessment only.
assessmentSubtitle: Answer accurately to get a precise result.
resultNote: This is a preliminary result and not an official engineering report.
